## formatDate() function

Return the date part of Date ISOString format, i.e: YYYY-MM-DD

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function formatDate(date?: Date): string;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

date


</td><td>

Date


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ date as string with YYYY-MM-DD


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

string

empty if called with no input, otherwise returns date in YYYY-MM-DD format
